item.description:
While I would like to do biking or hiking or kayaking or tennis probably not going to happen this weekend so let's do something different.  Let's join Kirk and our friends from the Social Fun group for a night of music and dancing

From the Johnny D's website:

For over 15 years Beatlejuice has been the #1 choice for Beatles fans looking to get their fix of the Fab 4.

Faithfully reproducing some of the greatest songs ever written, Beatlejuice covers every era of the Beatles catalog and on to the solo careers of the boys from Liverpool.

Note - you don't have to like the Beatles (or even know who they are) but you must like to dance as fitness is part of the requirement for being a member of our group.

No excuse if you don't have a car as Johnny D's is in Davis Sq. and right next to the T.  and no excuses if you don't know other people in the group as everyone dances with everyone.
item.how_to_find_us: Will email my contact info before the event
item.name: With all the rain lets still do something - Beatlejuice at Johnny D's 9/24 @9:30
